item.description:
Restaurant week is a really good opportunity to enjoy restaurants that are normally too expensive to go to. Chezi Henri is a modern French restaurant with a cuban twist. It has been rewritten up in numerous magazines nation-wide over the past ten years. You can read the write ups on their web site.

For restaurant week, they are offering a set menu for $33.09 NOT including drinks, tax, or tip. You can also order off their regular menu if you don't want to order the set menu.

This is the link for the set menu: http://www.chezhenri....
Here is a link for the restaurant itself: http://www.chezhenri....

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Restaurant Week at Chez Henri in Cambridge
